DOC.detailed_description: Laryngeal Tube Suction Disposable , LTS-D ( VBM Medizintechnik GmbH , Sulz , Germany ) Supreme Laryngeal Mask Airway , SLMA ( Intavent Orthofix , Maidenhead , UK ) second generation , single-use , supraglottic airway device ( SADs ) , add gastric access , use spontaneously mechanically ventilated patient undergo general anesthesia . The effectiveness LTS-D SLMA well establish ; however , oropharyngeal seal pressure device different head/neck position performance device use positive pressure ventilation evaluate . Changing head/neck position alter seal capability SAD . To investigator best knowledge study compare oropharyngeal seal pressure different head neck position use device .
